programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Jekshen is an exceptional runner living in a beautiful mountain village in Kyrgyzstan. Struggling to live with his divorced alcoholic father, Jeksen sees an upcoming big race as an opportunity to change his life for the better.

programme.title: The Return (2018)
programme.desc: Two Danish-Korean adoptees, Karoline and Thomas, return to their birth country for the first time. The pair meet in Seoul where they encounter fellow adoptees, sparking an emotional journey that challenges their destiny and identity.

programme.title: Black As The Snow 3: Off Limits
programme.desc: A senior executive of a multinational company is murdered on a ski lift in the French Alps. Captain Meyer decides to investigate after learning that his ex-lover is a suspect. Accompanied by French Officer Vivier, he is determined to unravel the mystery.

programme.title: In His Hands
programme.desc: Clara, a lawyer, leads a serene but monotonous life alongside her husband Damien and their two children. One evening, she succumbs to the charm of a mysterious sculptor. This one scorching night will have dramatic repercussions for her and her family.

programme.title: The Rising Tide
programme.desc: When her father fails to return home, the sound of his boat’s engine is the only thing a daughter has to remember of him. Learning from an elderly mechanic, she wishes to repair her father’s boat in hope of his return.

programme.title: Cortina Express

programme.title: The Takeover
programme.desc: Cédric works in a company specialized in precision mechanics. Its management, run by an investment fund, is disastrous. As another fund is about to buy it again, Cédric decides to take the company over, giving it to the employees.

programme.title: Murder Party
programme.desc: Jeanne, a brilliant architect, is appointed to restore the sumptuous Daguerre mansion owned by an eccentric family. When the patriarch is found dead during a murder party, Jeanne finds herself caught up in a real-life investigation to unmask the killer.
